name: COVID19ICD10CMValueSetForChronicHepatitisB
title: COVID19 ICD10CM Value Set for Chronic Hepatitis B
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to chronic hepatitis B viral infection and is listed as a gastrointestinal/liver disease on the CDC SARS-CoV-2 hospitalization surveillance case report form.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes chronic hepatitis B viral infection.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes acute and unspecified hepatitis B.)

Chronic viral hepatitis B without delta-agent

Chronic viral hepatitis B without delta-agent
